msg: MAPREDUCE-1395. Sqoop does not check return value of Job.waitForCompletion(). Contributed by Aaron Kimball.

msg: MAPREDUCE-1394. Sqoop generates incorrect URIs in paths sent to Hive. Contributed by Aaron Kimball.

msg: MAPREDUCE-1313. Fix NPE in Sqoop when table with null fields uses escape
